main_definition: A sharp-edged piece of metal, usually attached to a handle or shaft, used as part of an implement such as a knife, axe, or sword.

meanings_and_examples.example: I use the pruning blade to trim the overgrown branches.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Part of a wind turbine or solar panel system
meanings_and_examples.example: The blades of the windmill spin rapidly in the breeze, generating electricity.
He hit a powerful line drive with his blade up the middle.
The knight wields his sword, slashing at his enemies with deadly precision.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A part of a weapon used in combat
meanings_and_examples.example: The swordsman drew his blade and prepared to duel the enemy.
